agenda_items.title: Confirmation of draft Minutes of the 40th and 41st BoG Meetings
agenda_items.decision: Minutes of 40th BoG confirmed with modifications for sitting fees; Minutes of 41st BoG confirmed.

agenda_items.title: Actions taken on decisions of 39th BoG meeting
agenda_items.decision: Board noted various actions; confirmed CS(MA) rules for Medical Benefits to employees.

agenda_items.title: Implementation of 7th CPC benefits
agenda_items.decision: Approved for faculty and non-teaching staff after receiving relevant letter from MHRD.

agenda_items.title: Ratification of Chairperson's delegation of administrative & financial powers
agenda_items.decision: Ratified and emphasized following CVC Guidelines, GFR, Manual of Works, and procurement rules.

agenda_items.title: Service issues of Shri Sumanta Chakraborti

sub_items.decision: No upgradation to Ph.D. due to administrative lapses.
Pay band upgradation not allowed without Master's Degree.
Irregularities in GPF/pension benefits; legal opinion advised; decision confirmed for implementation.

agenda_items.title: Unauthorized absence of Shri Kishan Choudhury
agenda_items.decision: Further reply to be sought; matter to be discussed in next BoG meeting.

agenda_items.title: Requirement of additional teaching posts
agenda_items.decision: 293 posts approved; follow-up with MHRD for additional 74 posts; extension of contractual faculty approved with conditions.

agenda_items.title: Renaming of non-teaching posts and allocation per 200-point roster
agenda_items.decision: 323 non-teaching posts approved; additional 82 posts to be sanctioned; designation/nomenclature per MHRD rules; roster to be approved by Director.

agenda_items.title: Introduction of Annual Self-Assessment for PBAS
agenda_items.decision: Approved; Director authorized to implement PBAS.

agenda_items.title: Payment of allowances to faculty deputed under QIP
agenda_items.decision: Deferred; Registrar to follow QIP guidelines.

agenda_items.title: Ratification of faculty foreign visits under CPDA
agenda_items.decision: No need for future ratification; Chairman has authority.

agenda_items.title: Continuance of outsourcing agencies for Security, Housekeeping, Gardening
agenda_items.decision: Ratified; open tendering to be completed quickly.

agenda_items.title: Teachers Association issues
agenda_items.decision: Association must provide meeting details, attendance, decisions, and video recording; guidelines of Govt. of India to be followed.

agenda_items.title: Relaxation of age for contractual non-teaching employees
agenda_items.decision: Director to decide quantum of age relaxation as per MHRD letter.

agenda_items.title: Ratification of faculty nominations to BoG
Faculty recruitment process initiated in Sept 2017
agenda_items.decision: Guidelines, seat allocation, and reservation roster approved.

agenda_items.title: Upgradation of AGP for Associate Professors and Professors
Annual increments for faculty without Ph.D.
Annual pay enhancement for contractual employees
agenda_items.decision: Approved: 15% increase for pay â‰¤ Rs. 40,000, 5% for pay > Rs. 40,000; future contractual appointments with monthly pay only; reappointment allowed with conditions.

sub_items.decision: Guidelines approved; Director authorized to change TEQIP Team members.
